instructions:
SAUCE
1 cup brown sugar
1/2 tsp dry mustard
3 tbsp water
2 tbsp vinegar

Mix ham loaf ingredients and form into a loaf. Place on a rack in a baking dish and bake in a 350 F oven
for approximately 1 1/4 hours or to 160 F. Baste often with sauce. 
*(Rev. 6/23/94)*
name: Ham Loaf
creator: Lauretta Coffman
